choices.text:
Write an email to my boss letting them know I am leaving the company
Sure, here is a sample text you can use for your email.  Please note that this example does not include any personal details about yourself or your reasons for resigning and it also omits contact information at the bottom of the message. You may want to add these elements if they are relevant in your situation. I have included some suggestions below on how best to do so:
Dear [insert name], 
I wanted to let you know that after much consideration, I will be resigning from my position as a [insert job title] at the end of this month.  It has been an honor and privilege working with you over these past few years in building out our company's new AI platform for customer engagement. 

While it is bittersweet to leave such a fantastic team, I have decided that now is the right time for me personally as my family and I are planning on relocating back home [insert location] at the end of this year due to personal reasons related to health issues in our immediate families.  I wish you all continued success with your work going forward and hope we can stay connected over the years ahead! 

Best, 
[your name]
